item.title: Policy Paper Assignment
item.description: Due by the last day of class How to Write a Good Paper See examples of good student Op-eds on Blackboard (Course Documents) “How can I know what I think until I see what I say?” — E. M. Forster on Writing Overview Your task is to write a paper on a public policy or a non-market decision-making process or institution of your choosing, and to apply some economic insights to it.
